text: are global modules in themes not available on old DM Drag and Drop templates?
Had to deal with that earlier this week, ended up having to clone the drag and drop templates to HTML and put them in the theme folder locally

yargh. I’ve created a global theme module. but the site needs it backward compatible. Just cloneing the module and getting it outside of the theme worked. But now there are 2 global modules … which kinda defeats the purpose
